column1: '''''echor''''' is a [[Sindarin]] noun which means "encircling"<ref name="silmindex">{{S|Index}}

column2: "great ravine through the Encircling Mountains"<ref name="silmindex"/>
"great wall of the outer ring";<ref name="lotrindex">[[J.R.R. Tolkien]]
column4: "Index"</ref> the wall which encircled and enclosed the [[Pelennor Fields]]<ref>{{RK|V1}}</ref>
